text: Found this tennis lesson series on the meetup app and decided to attend to find out if itâ€™s any good. After my first session, i decided to sign up for package lessons because i thoroughly enjoyed the lesson and was happy to continue. The group sizes were perfect - groups of 4 students to 1 coach - which made the attention given nicely distributed. You will definitely pick up skills with these class sizes, and wont feel pressured or burnt out during the drills. I would definitely carry on with my lessons until i become proficient in the game!

Started learning with Shazam Tennis Academy recently. They are very welcoming to players of all levels and make tennis enjoyable to learn. The coaches are passionate about my progress as a player which is refreshing. Shazam group lessons are a good way for me to meet new players and keep fit. Learning tennis is fun and convenient with Shazam. Keep up the good work team!
Coaches are all friendly and patient with the students from all difference levels and backgrounds. Definitely worth giving a shot :)
